name: Die Cells
description:
Nothing Changes in Probia...

All of the chance in this country had been locked away by wizards, maybe it is time for someone to unlock it?

Armed with nothing but your skills and a magical dice bag, can you escape the prison and bring with you a new era of change in the land?

How To Play

W/A/S/D - Move in overworld and prison

Drag dice to a unit to perform an action these actions are:

Red- attack

Blue - Shield

Light Blue - Move

Yellow - Special

White - Junk

Green - Heal

Notes

This is a prototype I recently stumbled upon when looking for old code for a different project. As such it isn't completed but I thought it was too good not to share. I can't promise whether or not I'll ever finish it but I was impressed with how much there was in this.

The first floor is completable and the second floor only has a few encounter types.

When in the shop, you can change which unit is purchasing skills through the inventory screen.

If you have any feedback or questions you can let me know here, on twitter,  oron my discord!
